features: BRUSHECO BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSHES are an eco-friendly alternative to traditional plastic. An estimated 1 billion plastic toothbrushes are thrown away each year in the USA alone. Our BrushEco sustainable wooden toothbrushes are made of 99.97% biodegradable and compostable materials. BPA Free and Made in the USA.
POLISH AWAY STAINS & REDUCE PLAQUE with medium firm bristle tufts that safely and gentle remove damaging elements to the teeth.

HELP SENSITIVE TEETH & GUMS with rounded bristle tips that gently massage the gum line unlike hard-bristle brushes that can injure sensitive gum tissue by causing gum recession, loss of enamel and increased sensitivity.

4-ROW TOOTHBRUSH has more tightly packed bristles that polish away stains and plaque build-up. Our 3-row toothbrush is specifically designed to disrupt the bacteria that cause gum disease using the Bass brushing technique. Together, they offer the most complete oral care for healthy teeth and gums.

PACK OF 1 BIODEGRADABLE TOOTHBRUSH for use on it’s own or in conjunction with our 4-Row toothbrush, Healthy Mouth Blend and Shine Powder for comprehensive Oral care with products that are better for you, and better for the planet.
body.description: Our Sustainable Bass Toothbrushes offer a gentle and nonabrasive way to keep your mouth, gums and teeth healthy and clean. The way we brush our teeth has an impact on our overall health. The tools we choose to use can make all the difference whether brushing is a health-giving habit or a habit that may cause harm. Statistics show that brushing too hard can lead to: gum recession, loss of enamel and sensitive teeth and gums. That's why we love our Bass toothbrushes. What makes our toothbrushes a wise choice? Better design - the design of our toothbrushes has been clinically proven to effectively reduce gum disease. Better materials - made from BPA-free plastics in the USA. Shorter handle forces us to rethink how we use the toothbrush & spaced out bristle tufts allow for the bristles to wiggle into gum line more effectively, disrupting bacteria that causes gum disease. Rounded bristle tips make sure you are gently massaging gum tissue rather than assaulting sensitive gum tissue. We are also proud to say that by using a Sustainable Bass Toothbrush you are combining function with design and a mission to give back. Functional because of its Bass toothbrush design features: rounded bristle tips, shorter handle, medium-firmness bristles, and (for the Adult 3-row option) spaced out bristle tufts. The Adult size 4-row option and the Junior size 3-row option both have bristle tufts that are closer together. So, they're both great for gently cleaning and polishing the teeth. Sustainable because BrushEco is made of 99.97% biodegradable and compostable materials. Beautiful, well, that's a judgment call. But we find the simple design and sustainable, bamboo construction to be beautiful. Heal and maintain a healthy mouth with our Sustainable Bass toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets deep in the gums
reviews.reviewText: Used these along with the OraWellness mouth oils instead of toothpaste at night to avoid a deep cleaning for my gums at the dentist. Gums healed back and dentist was impressed. No deep cleaning needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural material Bass toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Feels great, gets into tight spaces, love his toothbrush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bamboo is sustainable, plastic is NOT!
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful to have a bio-degradable toothbrush that is economical which arrived in a paper envelope, yay! Bristles are a bit stiff but seems to clean the teeth and gums well without causing damage as long as you brush them with a lighter hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bristles are soft and spread out so they fit in between your teeth well.
reviews.reviewText: They are gentle on my gums and allow me to brush gently and not rip apart my gums. The bristles are also spaced out well as to get in between all the teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't a fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Edge control tool
reviews.reviewText: The final piece has arrived! I had my gel, wax, and edge band ready, but I was still waiting on this toothbrush to arrive for the full edge experience. A lot of people on yt who make edge tutorials style their edges using a toothbrush, so I knew I needed to dedicate one for my edges. The bristles are soft on my edges, but they’re also sturdy enough to allow for styling. I feel like this brush will last a long time. It makes me feel better too that all profits from the toothbrush are donated towards environmental causes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The bamboo leaves a weird feeling in your mouth.
reviews.reviewText: They should have put some sort of resin over the bamboo because it feels so weird in your mouth. It’s very uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Are just right
reviews.reviewText: --better than the freebies from the dentist.
My favorite toothbrushes. The bristles are the right amount of soft/firm, and you get get them between your teeth.
